attributes.action: take the UK into the Eurozone, now that his 5 Tests, to assess whether the UK will adopt the Euro, have been passed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Can Britain’s economy run in synch with the Eurozone long term?  - Looks like a yes.
Will joining the Euro affect our flexible labour market? - possibly will help it.
Will it make unemployment worse? - The evidence says not.
Will it affect our world beating financial services industry? - they don't appear to be doing as well as their competition in the Euro Zone at the moment.
Will it stop foreign firms investing in Britain?  - The reverse appears to be true.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
